revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: (Recto);;80th (cleruchy?). Proclus, son of Titoes, porter;;Gaius, son of Satorneinos, grandson of Kiape;;Petesouchos, son of Petheus and Heras, grandson of Charidemos;;Petheus, son of Onnophris and Tasoucharion, grandson of Heron;;Ptolemaios, son of Petearmothis, grandson of Anchophis;;Charidemos, son of Petheus and Heras, attendant;;Ptolemaios, son of Sokmenis(?), grandson of Pakysis;;Pitiro - - -, son of Sok - - -(?), grandson of Harmachis;;Pasion, son of - - -, grandson of Pe - - -, - - -;;(Verso);;16th (volume?), 4th column.

listBibl.bibl: Sijpesteijn PJ, PMich XV, 710, 1982, Pl. XII -- BL VIII, 219 (on line 6). - Line 6: read probably diakon instead of sakko(--); line 7: read Pakyseos instead of Paouseos (if this reading is right, this Ptolemaios is not the same as Ptolemaios, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Pausis, for which see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 220; P.Cair.Mich. 359, 673); line 9: read Pasio[n instead of Paso[n. (PH)
